# Tips for finding answers

Our saved answers will continue growing as we respond to new questions and refine old responses. To find your answer quickly on the Answers tab, we recommend you:

- Use the *control-F* function to search for a keyword

- Browse the right side *navigation bar* for customer questions

**Frequently used links**

- Preferred Contractor Network: *https://www.mnashp.org/preferred-contractor-network-homeowners*

- Cost of Heat Comparison: *https://www.mnashp.org/cost-of-heat-comparison*

- Incentives and Financing: *https://www.mnashp.org/incentives-financing*
